raw_comment: I notice that there are more dots on the top of the line. There are also more countries listed. I Wonder why there are less listed on the bottom. This relates to my community because i live on the earth and hope it be a better place to live. The graph is about what percentage of young people think  the world is getting better  and if older people think the world is getting better. A catchy  title is: Is the Earth getting better?
ace_sentences: I notice that there are more dots at the top of the line.
I notice that there are more countries in the list.
I wonder why there are fewer countries in the list at the bottom.
I hope that Earth will be a better place to live.
The graph is about a percentage of young people.
The graph is about a percentage of older people.
The graph shows what percentage of young people think that the world is getting better.
The graph shows what percentage of older people think that the world is getting better.
The title is: Is the Earth getting better?
